Knowledge Resources
• Knowledge Resource: any information resource that contains 
or embodies knowledge
or embodies knowledge
Ontological Resource is a set of elements extracted
Ontological Resource is a set of elements, extracted 
from a set of ontologies, available for solving a need. 
Elements from this set can be: 
• ontologies, 
Knowledge Resource
• ontology modules, 
• ontology statements 
• ontology design patterns.
Non-Ontological Resource (NOR) is an existing 
knowledge resource whose semantics has not yet been 
f
f

formalized by means of an ontology.
